name: ipc-json-bridge
description: A CLI tool to bridge IPC calls to stdio using simple JSON commands.

scripts.build:linux:amd64: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/linux/amd64/ipc-json-bridge src/main.go src/getPeerPID_linux.go
scripts.build:linux:arm: GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm go build -o bin/linux/arm/ipc-json-bridge src/main.go src/getPeerPID_linux.go
scripts.build:linux:arm64: GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/linux/arm64/ipc-json-bridge src/main.go src/getPeerPID_linux.go
scripts.build:linux:386: GOOS=linux GOARCH=386 go build -o bin/linux/386/ipc-json-bridge src/main.go src/getPeerPID_linux.go
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:linux:amd64 && npm run build:linux:arm && npm run build:linux:arm64 && npm run build:linux:386
scripts.build:darwin:amd64: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/darwin/amd64/ipc-json-bridge src/main.go src/getPeerPID_noop.go
scripts.build:darwin:arm64: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/darwin/arm64/ipc-json-bridge src/main.go src/getPeerPID_noop.go
scripts.build:darwin: npm run build:darwin:amd64 && npm run build:darwin:arm64
scripts.build:windows:amd64: GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/windows/amd64/ipc-json-bridge.exe src/main.go src/getPeerPID_noop.go
scripts.build:windows:386: GOOS=windows GOARCH=386 go build -o bin/windows/386/ipc-json-bridge.exe src/main.go src/getPeerPID_noop.go
scripts.build:windows:arm: GOOS=windows GOARCH=arm go build -o bin/windows/arm/ipc-json-bridge.exe src/main.go src/getPeerPID_noop.go
scripts.build:windows:arm64: GOOS=windows GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/windows/arm64/ipc-json-bridge.exe src/main.go src/getPeerPID_noop.go
scripts.build:windows: npm run build:windows:amd64 && npm run build:windows:386 && npm run build:windows:arm && npm run build:windows:arm64
scripts.build: npm run build:linux && npm run build:darwin && npm run build:windows
